overview:
Currently Chief Executive Officer and Co-Founder of Canvas.

Jim is an Award winning mobile and wireless solution executive with a deep background in wireless start-up ventures. Most recently, Jim was V.P and Managing Director of the enterprise wireless solutions division at inCode Wireless (a VeriSign Company). While in this role Jimâ€™s team was honored with the Motorola Wireless Solution of the Year Award. Prior to VeriSign, Jim held leadership roles within other prominent wireless start-ups including Aether Systems (one of the first major Blackberry re-sellers), Orbcomm and a wireless technology division of R.R. Donnelley (one of the worlds largest paper form manufacturers). During this time period, Jim was named one of the top 20 people in his field by the World Supply Chain Forum and Chief Logistics Officer Magazine. Mr. Quigley has also held roles within United Technologies and Transamerica Finance. Jim is a graduate of the United States Merchant Marine Academy (B.S. Marine Engineering) and a former U.S. Naval Officer.

relationships.title: V.P. Managing Director - Enterprise Wireless Solutions

milestones.description: Awarded Motorola Wireless Solution of the Year.

Named one of top 20 global logistics and supply chain industry executives by the World Supply Chain Forum and Chief Logistics Officer Magazine.  Nominated and awarded for his strong advocacy of wireless solutions to extend connections to mobile workers
Founds Canvas with Marc Austin and Matt Warner
